SEARCH
Package dev.Pedro.movies_api.service

Class AuthService

java.lang.Object
dev.Pedro.movies_api.service.AuthService
@Service public class AuthService extends Object
Service for handling authentication and user registration.

Provides methods to handle user login and signup, including password encoding, role assignment, and JWT token generation.

  • Constructor Details

    • AuthService

      public AuthService(UserRepository userRepository, RoleRepository roleRepository, org.springframework.security.crypto.password.PasswordEncoder encoder, org.springframework.security.authentication.AuthenticationManager authenticationManager, JwtUtils jwtUtils)
      Constructs the authentication service with required dependencies.
      Parameters:
      userRepository - repository to manage users
      roleRepository - repository to manage roles
      encoder - password encoder for storing hashed passwords
      authenticationManager - manager to authenticate login credentials
      jwtUtils - utility to generate and validate JWT tokens

  • Method Details

    • handleLoginService

      public JwtResponse handleLoginService(LoginRequest login)
      Authenticates a user and generates a JWT token.
      Parameters:
      login - the LoginRequest containing username and password
      Returns:
      a JwtResponse containing JWT token, user info, and roles

    • handleSignupService

      public User handleSignupService(SignupRequest signup)
      Registers a new user and assigns roles.
      Parameters:
      signup - the SignupRequest containing user info and optional roles
      Returns:
      the saved User entity
      Throws:
      UsernameAlreadyExistsException - if the username already exists
      EmailAlreadyExistsException - if the email already exists
      RoleNotFoundException - if any specified role does not exist in the database
